items.name: Object_Background
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_Background
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_Background extends gs.Object_Visual
    @objectCodecBlackList = ["parent"]
    
    ###*
    * A game object used for backgrounds in a scene.
    *
    * @module vn
    * @class Object_Background
    * @extends gs.Object_Visual
    * @memberof vn
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (parent, data) ->
        super(data)
        @zIndex = 0
        
        ###*
        * The object's source rectangle. It controls which part of the object's image is used
        * for visual presentation.
        * @property srcRect
        * @type gs.Rect
        ###
        @srcRect = new Rect()

        ###*
        * The object's mask to execute masking-effects on it.
        * @property mask
        * @type gs.Mask
        ###
        @mask = new gs.Mask()
        
        ###*
        * The rotation-angle of the background in degrees. The rotation center depends on the
        * anchor-point.
        * @property angle
        * @type number
        ###
        @angle = 0
        
        ###*
        * The object's image used for visual presentation.
        * @property image
        * @type string
        ###
        @image = ""
        
        ###*
        * The color tone of the object used for the visual presentation.
        * @property tone
        * @type gs.Tone
        ###
        @tone = new Tone(0, 0, 0, 0)

        ###*
        * The object's animator-component to execute different kind of animations like move, rotate, etc. on it.
        * @property animator
        * @type vn.Component_Animator
        ###
        @animator = new gs.Component_Animator()
        
        ###*
        * The object's visual-component to display the game object on screen.
        * @property visual
        * @type gs.Component_Sprite
        ###
        @visual = new gs.Component_TilingPlane()
        @visual.imageFolder = "Graphics/Backgrounds"
        
        @addComponent(@visual)
        @addComponent(@animator)
        @componentsFromDataBundle(data)
        
        #@update()
    
    ###*
    * Restores the game object from a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method restore
    * @param {Object} data - The data-bundle.
    ###    
    restore: (data) ->
        super(data)
        
        @srcRect = gs.Rect.fromObject(data.srcRect)
        @mask = gs.Mask.fromObject(data.mask)
        @visual.looping = data.looping
        
        
    ###*
    * Serializes the object into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    * @return {Object} The data-bundle.
    ### 
    toDataBundle: ->
        components = @componentsToDataBundle(gs.Component_Animation)
                
        result = {
            dstRect: @dstRect,
            srcRect: @srcRect,
            opacity: @opacity,
            origin: @origin,
            zIndex: @zIndex,
            mask: @mask.toDataBundle(),
            motionBlur: @motionBlur,
            zoom: @zoom,
            angle: @angle,
            anchor: @anchor,
            offset: @offset,
            mirror: @mirror,
            tone: @tone,
            image: @image,
            looping: @visual.looping,
            components: components
        }
    
        return result
    
    
vn.Object_Background = Object_Background
